title: Royal Sentinel Armor
contents: description | Taunt (1 Charge) | As a bonus action, you can taunt a target within 5 feet. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.
description | Sacrifice (2 Charges)| As a reaction action, you can transfer damage (non AOE) to an ally (within 5 feet) to yourself.
text | Regain all charges after a long rest.

title: Empty vial of preserving poision/sweat
contents: text | You can store your sweat in this vial once per long rest.
text | As a bonus action, you can coat a slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition with your sweat in this vial.
